text: Kati ramro hunthyo tapar'inle dekhne bha'e jaba ki aparadhiharu aphno palanakartako agadi ta'uko nihura'irakheka hunechan ra bhanne chan ki ‘‘he hamro palanakarta! Hamile dekhihalyaum ra sunihalyaum. Aba timile hamila'i (sansarama) phirta patha'ide'u, taki asala karma garaum, hami astha rakhnevala haum.’’
